sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Card.css' const Card = ({item}) => { const src1=item.img; const src2=item.img2; return (
document.getElementsByClassName('mainImg').src=src2} onMouseLeave={(e)=>document.getElementsByClassName('mainImg').src=src1}/>

{item.title}

${item.oldPrice} ${item.price}
) } export default Card
